game2dai.graph

Class GraphEdge

  • java.lang.Object
    • game2dai.graph.GraphEdge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Object>

    public class GraphEdge
extends Object
implements Comparable<Object>
    This class is used to represent a directed edge between 2 nodes and the cost of traversing this edge.
    Author:
    Peter Lager

      • GraphEdge

        public GraphEdge(GraphNode from,
         GraphNode to,
         double cost)
        Create an edge from 2 existing nodes. If the cost is 0.0 then calculate the cost based on the physical distance between the nodes.
        Parameters:
        from - 'from' node
        to - 'to' node
        cost - traversal cost
